alert.note: Alert for Latah (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 26 at 10:55PM MST until December 28 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Washington...Idaho... Paradise Creek at Moscow affecting Latah and eastern Whitman Counties. .Heavy rain falling and melting snow will lead to rapid rises on Paradise Creek. Warm and windy weather Tuesday and Tuesday night will also contribute to runoff from melting snow. For the Paradise Creek ...including Moscow...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. This approaches the flood of record. * WHERE...Paradise Creek at Moscow. * WHEN...From late tonight to early Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Water will be up to the homes near the intersection of Bridge and Hillcrest. Intersection at 5th and Roosevelt will be flooded. Water will be out of the banks at the D Street bridge. Storm drains along Main Street will be backed up and overflowing. Mountainview Park will be flooded. Bike path along the creek near the University will be under 6 inches of water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM PST Monday the stage was 7.4 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight and crest near 9.6 feet late Tuesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 9.2 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 9.7 feet on 12/30/2017. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (10 pm PST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Paradise Creek Moscow 9.2 7.4 Mon 8 pm PST 9.2 8.2 7.1 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/spokane. The next statement will be issued Tuesday morning at 1000 AM PST.
